name: spring showers shawl
notes:
> this pattern is available for **[free on
> my blog][1]**. the downloadable pdf
> listed here for sale contains the full
> pattern (including crochet charts), in one printable file without advertisements.

 
join the [**pattern paradise crochet community fb group**][2] to crochet along with us 
 
 
this shawl is a beautiful triangle shawl made with basic crochet stitches that combine to create, lace, filet crochet and scalloped sections and border! it is the perfect accessory to be worn as a traditional shawl, wrap, scarf or fashion piece!

**the grey ombre shawl was made with custom dyed yarn by [**kt & the squid**][6]!. be sure to visit her shop to see all her beautiful yarns!**


size: as shown, approximately 54" x 26"
worked in #3 dk weight yarn


my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures, stitch guides and explanations, as necessary, to make them easy to follow.

please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info, coupon codes and giveaways. **[www.facebook.com/patternparadise][7]**

follow my blog: **[www.pattern-paradise.com][8]**
